aws:requesttag/${tagkey}.description: Filters access by the tags that are passed in the request

aws:resourcetag/${tagkey}.description: Filters access by the tag key-value pairs attached to the resource

aws:tagkeys.description: Filters access by the tag keys that are passed in the request

ecs:createaction.description: Filters access by the name of a resource-creating API action

ecs:resourcetag/${tagkey}.description: Filters access by the tag key-value pairs attached to the resource

ecs:account-setting.description: Filters access by the Amazon ECS account setting name

ecs:capacity-provider.description: Filters access by the ARN of an Amazon ECS capacity provider

ecs:cluster.description: Filters access by the ARN of an Amazon ECS cluster

ecs:container-instances.description: Filters access by the ARN of an Amazon ECS container instance

ecs:container-name.description: Filters access by the name of an Amazon ECS container which is defined in the ECS task definition

ecs:enable-ebs-volumes.description: Filters access by the Amazon ECS managed Amazon EBS volume capability of your ECS task or service

ecs:enable-execute-command.description: Filters access by the execute-command capability of your Amazon ECS task or Amazon ECS service

ecs:enable-service-connect.description: Filters access by the enable field value in the Service Connect configuration

ecs:enable-vpc-lattice.description: Filters access by the VPC lattice capability of your Amazon ECS service

ecs:fargate-ephemeral-storage-kms-key.description: Filters access by the AWS KMS key id provided in the request

ecs:namespace.description: Filters access by the ARN of AWS Cloud Map namespace which is defined in the Service Connect Configuration

ecs:service.description: Filters access by the ARN of an Amazon ECS service

ecs:task.description: Filters access by the ARN of an Amazon ECS task

ecs:task-definition.description: Filters access by the ARN of an Amazon ECS task definition
